last_episode_to_air.name: The Moon That Embraces the Sun
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Yoon Dae Hyung's private army surrounds Hweon and his retinue, Yang Myung finds himself on the verge of killing his brother.

name: The Moon Embracing the Sun
overview: Years after she's assumed dead by the palace, a young noblewoman, now trained as a shaman, returns to court to reclaim her rightful position as queen.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After enemies order her killed, future queen Yeon Woo is rescued and raised by a shaman. She returns to court years later with no memory of her past.

episodes.name: Two Suns and a Moon
episodes.overview: Young Yeon Woo, the daughter of a noble family, attends a ceremony honoring her brother at the palace, where she runs into Crown Prince Hweon.

episodes.name: Two Moons and a Sun
episodes.overview: Yeon Woo's brother, Heo Yeom, is appointed to teach the Crown Prince, who does not welcome the new teacher. Meanwhile, Queen Yoon plots a conspiracy.

episodes.name: Like Petals, Like Fireworks
episodes.overview: Nok Yeong senses an aura from the two girls at the palace; Queen Yoon orders her to read their fate to see whether one will marry the crown prince.

episodes.name: One Sun, One Moon
episodes.overview: Yoon Dae Hyeong's clan begins its plan to make Bo Kyung the owner of Kyo Tae Palace. Hweon asks Yeon Woo to submit her name to be the prince’s wife.

episodes.name: Fallen Moon
episodes.overview: As Yeon Woo begins the training she will need as the crown prince's wife, Queen Yoon orders Nok Yeong to put a debilitating spell on Yeon Woo.

episodes.name: Hidden Moon
episodes.overview: Having accepted a great god to become a shaman, Yeon Woo loses memories of her past due to the shock. Meanwhile, Bo Kyung becomes the crown princess.

episodes.name: Shaman Wol - Moon
episodes.overview: Despite Nok Yeong's warning that she avoid strangers, Yeon Woo heads out to the streets when she learns that the king will be visiting the village.

episodes.name: Shaman Who Absorbs Adversity
episodes.overview: After nearly being rescued by a disguised Yang Myung, a captive Weol is dragged to the palace to act as a human talisman for Hweon.

episodes.name: Moon That Is Hidden Beside the Sun
episodes.overview: Hweon wakes up and furiously commands Weol to name the person who ordered her to spy on him. Bo Kyung is uneasy that a shaman serves the king in bed.

episodes.name: Correspondence of the Dead
episodes.overview: Hweon orders Hyung Sun to bring in the royal doctor to treat Weol. Bo Kyung is distraught by the relationship between Hweon and the shaman.

episodes.name: Secret Love
episodes.overview: Yang Myung stops Weol going to the king's quarters and confronts Nok Yeong. Her warning to not become closer to Weol leads to an argument.

episodes.name: Road of Tears
episodes.overview: Yoon Dae Hyung tries to find out the reason of Hweon's secret inspection. Bo Kyung learns that the date of consummation is only three days away.

episodes.name: Witch Hunts
episodes.overview: After Hweon faints before consummation with his queen, a humiliated Bo Kyung conspires to charge Weol for practicing witchcraft and defame Hweon.

episodes.name: Why Am I Dead?
episodes.overview: Weol is sentenced to exile, while Hweon loses his leadership to bureaucrats. He visits Weol in jail and, hiding his heart, commands her to leave him.

episodes.name: Once Again, Two Suns and Two Moons
episodes.overview: Yeon Woo asks Seol about the situation when she was blessed to become a shaman. Woon dismisses the army keeping Yang Myung at his house.

episodes.name: True Identity of the Moon
episodes.overview: After meeting shaman Weol, Bo Kyung becomes terrified thinking that Yeon Woo has been resurrected. Later, some news from her past shocks Yeon Woo.

episodes.name: The Sun Embracing the Moon
episodes.overview: When burglars come to the Infirmary and attack Yeon Woo and Yang Myung, Woon and Hweon guard her. Yang Myung flees from the burglars with Yeon Woo.

episodes.name: Bloody Precursor
episodes.overview: Princess Min Hwa is pregnant after a long wait and goes to the palace to give Hweon the happy news. Hweon speaks to the queen of his final decision.

episodes.name: Rebellion
episodes.overview: Street posters convict the king for having a shaman in his bedroom and the clan of Yoon for having murdered the previous crown princess.

episodes.name: The Moon That Embraces the Sun
episodes.overview: When Yoon Dae Hyung's private army surrounds Hweon and his retinue, Yang Myung finds himself on the verge of killing his brother.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After enemies order her killed, future queen Yeon Woo is rescued and raised by a shaman. She returns to court years later with no memory of her past.
